fields.normal: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
fields.charged: Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG.
fields.plunging: Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky!
description.3: Summons a Wind Domain at the opponent's location, dealing <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo> and launching opponents into the air.
description.6: Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo> and launching affected opponents into the air.
description.7: After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air.
description.9: Opponents hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.
description.11: In the days when gods and men walked the earth together, the heavens were filled with countless songs. This melody has long since been forgotten.

description.0: Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in opponents and deals continuous <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.
description.3: If the Stormeye comes into contact with <hydro>Hydro</hydro>/<pyro>Pyro</pyro>/<cryo>Cryo</cryo>/<electro>Electro</electro>, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
description.4: Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
description.6: Many hymns written in praise of the Anemo Archon have been lost to time. This one sings of his mastery over the wind.

description.0: Holding Skyward Sonnet creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.
Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of Wind's Grand Ode end.
description.1: If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element in the party.

description.0: Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
description.1: Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

description.0: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.
Skyward Sonnet decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.
description.1: Opponents launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

description.0: Increases the Level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3.
When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% <anemo>Anemo DMG Bonus</anemo> for 10s.
Increases the Level of Skyward Sonnet by 3.
Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
description.1: If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
